label: 大外記
対訳語: senior secretary of the Council of State
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: senior secretary of the Council of State, serving as staff to the junior counselors (shōnagon). One of this secretary's responsibilities was to receive royal orders from the dainaiki of the Ministry of Central Affairs and then to transmit them to the Council of State for discussion and promulgation. [少納言、大内記]
